verses.name: Job 34:23
verses.text: For he will not lay upon man more than right; that he should enter into judgment with God.

verses.name: Job 34:24
verses.text: He shall break in pieces mighty men without number, and set others in their stead.

verses.name: Job 34:25
verses.text: Therefore he knoweth their works, and he overturneth them in the night, so that they are destroyed.

verses.name: Job 34:26
verses.text: He striketh them as wicked men in the open sight of others;

verses.name: Job 34:27
verses.text: Because they turned back from him, and would not consider any of his ways:

verses.name: Job 34:28
verses.text: So that they cause the cry of the poor to come unto him, and he heareth the cry of the afflicted.
